name: PER
description: Person entity. Refers to human beings, specific individuals, or groups. NOT including fictional characters, animals, or personified objects.

name: ORG
description: Organization entity. Companies, agencies, institutions. NOT referring to the physical buildings where they work.

name: LOC
description: Location entity. Geographical areas, cities, countries, mountains. NOT including political groups or governments associated with the location.

name: MISC
description: Miscellaneous entities. Events, nationalities, works of art. NOT including specific people or organizations.
